expose_image: sh -c 'python demo.py --image-folder /workspace/data/input --exp-cfg data/conf.yaml --show=False --output-folder OUTPUT_FOLDER --save-params True --save-vis True --save-mesh True && python npz_transform.py --input-folder OUTPUT_FOLDER --output-folder /workspace/data/output && python move_png.py --input-folder OUTPUT_FOLDER --output-folder /workspace/data/output'
expose_video: sh -c 'python demo.py --image-folder /workspace/data/input --exp-cfg data/conf.yaml --show=False --output-folder OUTPUT_FOLDER --save-params True --save-vis True --save-mesh True && python npz_transform.py --input-folder OUTPUT_FOLDER --output-folder npz_transformed && python npz_integration.py --input-folder npz_transformed --output-folder /workspace/data/output && python frames_to_video.py --input-folder OUTPUT_FOLDER --output-folder /workspace/data/output'
4dhumans_video: sh -c '/opt/conda/envs/4D-humans/bin/pip install phalp[all]@git+https://github.com/brjathu/PHALP.git && python track.py video.source='/workspace/data/input/FILENAME' video.output_dir='/workspace/data/output' && python postprocessing.py --input_file '/workspace/data/output/results/demo_WithoutExte.pkl' --output_file '/workspace/data/output/results/demo_WithoutExte.npz' && rm /workspace/data/output/track.log'
4dhumans_image: sh -c '/opt/conda/envs/4D-humans/bin/pip install phalp[all]@git+https://github.com/brjathu/PHALP.git && python track.py video.source='/workspace/data/input/FILENAME' video.output_dir='/workspace/data/output' && python postprocessing.py --input_file '/workspace/data/output/results/demo_WithoutExte.pkl' --output_file '/workspace/data/output/results/demo_WithoutExte.npz' && rm /workspace/data/output/track.log'
